languages.text: Некоторым жителям колонии во сне являются святые, рабочих обуревает опасный религиозный экстаз!
Some inhabitants of the colony are being visited by saints in their dreams — the workers are growing dangerously ecstatic from these pious visions.
languages.original_text: Некоторым жителям колонии во сне являются святые, рабочих обуревает опасный религиозный экстаз!

traits.locale_text: Saints come to the people of the colony in their dreams — the workers grow dangerously ecstatic from these pious visions.
The colony's inhabitants are afflicted with religious ecstasy and visions.
Some inhabitants of the colony are being visited by saints in their dreams — the workers are growing dangerously ecstatic from these pious visions.
The colony's inhabitants are afflicted with religious ecstasy and visions.

Saints come to the people of the colony in their dreams — the workers grow dangerously ecstatic from these pious visions.
Some inhabitants of the colony are being visited by saints in their dreams — the workers are growing dangerously ecstatic from these pious visions.
Some inhabitants of the colony are being visited by saints in their dreams — the workers are growing dangerously ecstatic from these pious visions.
Some inhabitants of the colony are being visited by saints in their dreams — the workers are growing dangerously ecstatic from these pious visions.

languages.text: Certains habitants de la colonie reçoivent la visite de saints dans leurs rêves et les ouvriers sont de plus en plus nombreux à verser dans un dangereux fanatisme devant ces pieuses apparitions.
languages.original_text: Some inhabitants of the colony are being visited by saints in their dreams — the workers are growing dangerously ecstatic from these pious visions.

traits.locale_text: Certains habitants de la colonie reçoivent la visite de saints dans leurs rêves et les ouvriers sont de plus en plus nombreux à verser dans un dangereux fanatisme devant ces pieuses apparitions.

languages.text: コロニーの住民の一部は、夢の中で聖人の訪問を受けている。労働者たちは、敬虔なビジョンによって危ういほど陶酔している。
languages.original_text: Some inhabitants of the colony are being visited by saints in their dreams — the workers are growing dangerously ecstatic from these pious visions.

traits.locale_text: コロニーの住民の一部は、夢の中で聖人の訪問を受けている。労働者たちは、敬虔なビジョンによって危ういほど陶酔している。

languages.text: 殖民地的一部分居民在梦中见到了圣人。这些虔诚的幻象让众多工人欣喜若狂，但这样的狂热可能会带来危险。
languages.original_text: Some inhabitants of the colony are being visited by saints in their dreams — the workers are growing dangerously ecstatic from these pious visions.

traits.locale_text: 殖民地的一部分居民在梦中见到了圣人。这些虔诚的幻象让众多工人欣喜若狂，但这样的狂热可能会带来危险。

languages.text: Algunos habitantes de la colonia reciben la visita de santos en sueños. Los trabajadores están alcanzando un éxtasis peligroso por estas visiones piadosas
languages.original_text: Some inhabitants of the colony are being visited by saints in their dreams — the workers are growing dangerously ecstatic from these pious visions.

traits.locale_text: Algunos habitantes de la colonia reciben la visita de santos en sueños. Los trabajadores están alcanzando un éxtasis peligroso por estas visiones piadosas

languages.text: Einige Bewohner der Kolonie werden in ihren Träumen von Heiligen besucht. die Arbeiter steigern sich durch diese frommen Visionen in eine gefährliche Ekstase hinein.
languages.original_text: Some inhabitants of the colony are being visited by saints in their dreams — the workers are growing dangerously ecstatic from these pious visions.

traits.locale_text: Einige Bewohner der Kolonie werden in ihren Träumen von Heiligen besucht. die Arbeiter steigern sich durch diese frommen Visionen in eine gefährliche Ekstase hinein.

languages.text: Bazı koloni sakinleri, rüyalarında azizleri görüyor. Bu dinî görüleri, işçileri tehlikeli bir şekilde kendilerinden geçiriyor.
languages.original_text: Some inhabitants of the colony are being visited by saints in their dreams — the workers are growing dangerously ecstatic from these pious visions.

traits.locale_text: Bazı koloni sakinleri, rüyalarında azizleri görüyor. Bu dinî görüleri, işçileri tehlikeli bir şekilde kendilerinden geçiriyor.
